# cmccloudv2_backup (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# get backup by id
data "cmccloudv2_backup" "backup_1" {  
    backup_id = "07d7eb8f-62ae-4751-968a-3955ef0a6974"
}

# get backup by name
data "cmccloudv2_backup" "backup_2" {  
    name = "backup-dev"
}

# get latest full backup of a volume
data "cmccloudv2_backup" "backup_3" {  
    volume_id = "2feafa48-8fe7-426f-b35f-aa7761fa97ec"
	status = "available"
	is_latest = true
	is_incremental = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `backup_id` (String) Id of the backup
- `is_incremental` (Boolean) filter by volume bootable
- `is_latest` (Boolean) true if you want to get the latest backup that match other filter
- `name` (String) Filter by name of backup (case-insenitive)
- `status` (String) Filter by status of backup (case-insenitive), match exactly
- `volume_id` (String) Id of the volume

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `real_size_gb` (Number)
